+As a decentralized community, it is important that for all governance actions, especially in ECIP, the established process is followed. In this section, we document irregular process transitions, and give special permissions to them, in order to establish them _ex post facto_ as following procedure. Note that this is essentially similar to theDAO hard fork in Ethereum, and should only be added in extreme cases.
 
-* In [PR#199](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/199), Afri Schoedon merged a PR moving ECIP-1061 to "Last Call" status. At the time, Afri dismissed a review of clear objections from ECIP editor Wei Tang, without waiting for consultations of the community, or resolutions with the review submitter. We here declare that this particular action from Afri followed the ECIP process. 
+* [Pull Request #199](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/blob/gh/.gh-pullrequests/00199.json) was [merged](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/blob/gh/.gh-pullrequests/00199_event_2837817387.json), [moving it's associated ECIP to `Last Call` status](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/blob/gh/.gh-pullrequests/00199.patch#L21) after [dismissing](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/blob/gh/.gh-pullrequests/00199_event_2837816513.json) a [review](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/blob/gh/.gh-pullrequests/00199_review_323755348.json) which [provided a reasonable objection](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/blob/gh/.gh-pullrequests/00199_review_323755348.json#L24).
